alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Showers with strong, gusty winds will impact portions of central Arapahoe and central Adams Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and possible thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Hoyt to 8 miles southwest of Byers, or along a line extending from 33 miles southwest of Fort Morgan to 35 miles east of Denver. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could produce areas of blowing dust and poor visibility. Locations impacted include... Bennett, Deer Trail, Strasburg, Leader and Byers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
